trans-unit.source: The SqlDependency object represents a query notification dependency between an application and an instance of SQL Server.
trans-unit.target: SqlDependency-objekt representerer en spørring varsling avhengighet mellom et program, og en forekomst av SQL Server.

trans-unit.source: An application can create a SqlDependency object and register to receive notifications via the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.OnChangeEventHandler"></xref> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Et program kan opprette en SqlDependency-objekt og Registrer deg for å motta varsler via den <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.OnChangeEventHandler"> </xref> hendelsesbehandlingen.

trans-unit.source: SqlDependency is ideal for caching scenarios, where your ASP.NET application or middle-tier service needs to keep certain information cached in memory.
trans-unit.target: SqlDependency er ideelle for bufring av tilfeller der ASP.NET-programmet, eller tjenesten midterste skalaenhet må beholde informasjon bufret i minnet.

trans-unit.source: SqlDependency allows you to receive notifications when the original data in the database changes so that the cache can be refreshed.
trans-unit.target: SqlDependency kan du motta varslinger når de opprinnelige dataene i databasen endres slik at hurtigbufferen kan oppdateres.

trans-unit.source: To set up a dependency, you need to associate a SqlDependency object to one or more <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> objects.
trans-unit.target: For å konfigurere en avhengighet, må du knytte et SqlDependency-objekt til en eller flere <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>objekter.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>

trans-unit.source: To receive notifications, you need to subscribe to the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.OnChange> event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil motta varslinger, må du abonnere på de <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.OnChange>hendelsen.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.OnChange>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the requirements for creating queries for notifications, see "Creating a Query for Notification" in SQL Server Books Online.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om kravene til å opprette spørringer for varsler, kan du se "Oppretter et for spørringsvarsler" i SQL Server Books Online.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > SqlDependency was designed to be used in ASP.NET or middle-tier services where there is a relatively small number of servers having dependencies active against the database.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > SqlDependency er utviklet som skal brukes i ASP.NET eller midterste skalaenhet tjenester der det er et relativt lite antall servere som har aktive mot databasen avhengigheter.

trans-unit.source: It was not designed for use in client applications, where hundreds or thousands of client computers would have SqlDependency objects set up for a single database server.
trans-unit.target: Det ble ikke laget for bruk i klientprogrammer, der hundrevis eller tusenvis av klientdatamaskiner må SqlDependency-objekter som er angitt for en enkelt databaseserver.

trans-unit.source: If you are developing an application where you need reliable sub-second notifications when data changes, review the sections **Planning an Efficient Query Notifications Strategy** and **Alternatives to Query Notifications** in the [Planning for Notifications](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=211984) topic in SQL Server Books Online.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du utvikler et program der du trenger pålitelig undertype sekund varsler når data endres, leser du deler **planlegge en effektiv spørringen varsler strategi** og **alternativer til spørringsvarsler** i den [planlegging for varsler](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=211984) emnet i SQL Server Books Online.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Query Notifications in SQL Server](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and "Building Notification Solutions" in SQL Server Books Online.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [spørringsvarsler i SQL Server](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og "Bygging varsling løsninger" i SQL Server Books Online.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.OnChange> event may be generated on a different thread from the thread that initiated command execution.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.OnChange>hendelsen kan genereres på en annen tråd enn tråden som startet Kommandoutførelsen.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.OnChange>

trans-unit.source: Query notifications are supported only for SELECT statements that meet a list of specific requirements.
trans-unit.target: Spørringsvarsler støttes bare for SELECT-setninger som oppfyller en liste over spesifikke krav.

trans-unit.source: The following table provides links to the Service Broker and Query Notifications documentation in SQL Server Books Online.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor inneholder koblinger til dokumentasjonen Service Broker og spørringsvarsler i SQL Server Books Online.

trans-unit.target: **SQLServer Books Online** - [oppretting av en spørring for varsling](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms181122.aspx) - [sikkerhetshensyn for Service Broker](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms166059.aspx) - [sikkerhet og beskyttelse (Service Broker)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bb522911.aspx) - [sikkerhetshensyn for varsler Services](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms172604.aspx) - [spørring varsling tillatelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms188311.aspx) - [internasjonale hensyn Service Broker](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms166028.aspx) - [ved løsningen-utformingen (Service Broker)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bb522899.aspx) - [Service Broker Developer informasjonssenter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms166100.aspx) - [Developer's Guide (Service Broker)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bb522908.aspx)

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency"></xref> class with the default settings.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency"> </xref> klassen med standardinnstillinger.

trans-unit.source: The constructor initializes the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> object using the default Service Broker service name and time-out.
trans-unit.target: Konstruktøren initialiserer den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>objekt ved hjelp av standard Service Broker-servicenavnet og tidsavbrudd.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>

trans-unit.source: At some point after construction, you must use the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.AddCommandDependency%2A> method to associate one or more commands to this <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> object.
trans-unit.target: På et bestemt tidspunkt etter konstruksjon, må du bruke den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.AddCommandDependency%2A>metode for å knytte én eller flere kommandoer i denne <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>objektet.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.AddCommandDependency%2A>

trans-unit.source: Query notifications are supported only for SELECT statements that meet a list of specific requirements.
trans-unit.target: Spørringsvarsler støttes bare for SELECT-setninger som oppfyller en liste over spesifikke krav.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency"></xref> class and associates it with the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> parameter.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency"> </xref> klasse og knytter det til i <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref> parameteren.

trans-unit.source: Internally, this constructor creates an instance of the <xref:System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest> class, and binds it to a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object.
trans-unit.target: Internt denne konstruktøren oppretter en forekomst av den <xref:System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest>klasse og binder den til en <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>objektet.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> </xref:System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest>

trans-unit.source: Query notifications are supported only for SELECT statements that meet a list of specific requirements.
trans-unit.target: Spørringsvarsler støttes bare for SELECT-setninger som oppfyller en liste over spesifikke krav.

trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor inneholder koblinger til dokumentasjonen Service Broker og spørringsvarsler i SQL Server Books Online.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> object to associate with this <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref> objekt for å knytte til denne <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The constructor will set up a <xref href="System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest"></xref> object and bind it to the command.
trans-unit.target: Konstruktøren vil definere en <xref href="System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest"> </xref> objekt og bindes til kommandoen.

trans-unit.source: The command parameter is NULL.
trans-unit.target: Den command parameteren er NULL.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> object already has a <xref href="System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest"></xref> object assigned to its <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Notification*> property, and that <xref href="System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest"></xref> is not associated with this dependency.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref> objektet har allerede en <xref href="System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest"> </xref> objektet som er knyttet til den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Notification*>egenskap, og at <xref href="System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest"> </xref> er ikke knyttet til denne avhengigheten.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Notification*>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency"></xref> class, associates it with the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> parameter, and specifies notification options and a time-out value.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency"> </xref> klasse, knytter det til i <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref> parameter, og angir Varslingsalternativer og verdien for tidsavbrudd.

trans-unit.source: Query notifications are supported only for SELECT statements that meet a list of specific requirements.
trans-unit.target: Spørringsvarsler støttes bare for SELECT-setninger som oppfyller en liste over spesifikke krav.

trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor inneholder koblinger til dokumentasjonen Service Broker og spørringsvarsler i SQL Server Books Online.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> object to associate with this <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref> objekt for å knytte til denne <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The constructor sets up a <xref href="System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest"></xref> object and bind it to the command.
trans-unit.target: Konstruktøren definerer en <xref href="System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest"> </xref> objekt og bindes til kommandoen.

trans-unit.source: The notification request options to be used by this dependency.
trans-unit.target: Alternativene varsling forespørselen som skal brukes av denne avhengigheten.

trans-unit.source: `null` to use the default service.
trans-unit.target: `null`for å bruke tjenesten standard.

trans-unit.source: The time-out for this notification in seconds.
trans-unit.target: Tidsavbruddet for dette varselet i sekunder.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0, indicating that the server's time-out should be used.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 0, indikerer at serveren tidsavbrudd skal brukes.

trans-unit.source: The command parameter is NULL.
trans-unit.target: Den command parameteren er NULL.

trans-unit.source: The time-out value is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for tidsavbrudd er mindre enn null.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> object already has a <xref href="System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest"></xref> object assigned to its <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Notification*> property and that <xref href="System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest"></xref> is not associated with this dependency. An attempt was made to create a **SqlDependency** instance from within SQLCLR.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref> objektet har allerede en <xref href="System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest"> </xref> objektet som er knyttet til den <> </> *> egenskap, og at <xref href="System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest"> </xref> er ikke knyttet til denne avhengigheten. Det ble gjort et forsøk på å opprette en * *SqlDependency** serverforekomsten fra i SQLCLR.

trans-unit.source: Associates a <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> object with this <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Knytter en <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref> objekt med dette <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Query notifications are supported only for SELECT statements that meet a list of specific requirements.
trans-unit.target: Spørringsvarsler støttes bare for SELECT-setninger som oppfyller en liste over spesifikke krav.

trans-unit.source: The following table provides links to the Service Broker and Query Notifications documentation in SQL Server Books Online.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor inneholder koblinger til dokumentasjonen Service Broker og spørringsvarsler i SQL Server Books Online.

trans-unit.target: **SQLServer Books Online** - [oppretting av en spørring for varsling](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms181122.aspx) - [sikkerhetshensyn for Service Broker](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms166059.aspx) - [sikkerhet og beskyttelse (Service Broker)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bb522911.aspx) - [sikkerhetshensyn for varsler Services](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms172604.aspx) - [spørring varsling tillatelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms188311.aspx) - [internasjonale hensyn Service Broker](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms166028.aspx) - [ved løsningen-utformingen (Service Broker)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bb522899.aspx) - [Service Broker Developer informasjonssenter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms166100.aspx) - [Developer's Guide (Service Broker)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bb522908.aspx)

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> object containing a statement that is valid for notifications.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref> objektet som inneholder et uttrykk som er gyldig for varsler.

trans-unit.source: The command parameter is null.
trans-unit.target: Den command -parameteren er null.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> object already has a <xref href="System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest"></xref> object assigned to its <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Notification*> property, and that <xref href="System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest"></xref> is not associated with this dependency.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref> objektet har allerede en <xref href="System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest"> </xref> objektet som er knyttet til den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Notification*>egenskap, og at <xref href="System.Data.Sql.SqlNotificationRequest"> </xref> er ikke knyttet til denne avhengigheten.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Notification*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether one of the result sets associated with the dependency has changed.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om et resultatsett som er knyttet til avhengigheten er endret.

trans-unit.source: If you are not using the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.OnChange> event, you can check the HasChanges property to determine if the query results have changed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke bruker den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.OnChange>hendelse, kan du kontrollere HasChanges-egenskapen for å fastslå om resultatene av spørringen er endret.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.OnChange>

trans-unit.source: The HasChanges property does not necessarily imply a change in the data.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen HasChanges ikke nødvendigvis en endring i dataene.

trans-unit.source: Other circumstances, such as time-out expired and failure to set the notification request, also generate a change event.
trans-unit.target: Andre forhold, for eksempel Tidsavbrudd utløpt og kan ikke angi Varslingsforespørselen også generere en statusendringshendelsen.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value indicating whether one of the result sets has changed.
trans-unit.target: En boolsk verdi som angir om en resultatet angir er endret.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that uniquely identifies this instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som identifiserer denne forekomsten av den <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The Id property is used to uniquely identify a given <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> instance.
trans-unit.target: Id-egenskapen brukes til å identifisere en gitt <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>forekomsten.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>

trans-unit.source: A string representation of a GUID that is generated for each instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: En strengrepresentasjon av en GUID som genereres for hver forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a notification is received for any of the commands associated with this <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en melding er mottatt for alle kommandoer som er knyttet til dette <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: OnChange occurs when the results for the associated command change.
trans-unit.target: OnChange oppstår når resultatene for kommandoen tilknyttede endres.

trans-unit.source: If you are not using OnChange, you can check the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.HasChanges%2A> property to determine whether the query results have changed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke bruker OnChange, kan du sjekke den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.HasChanges%2A>til å fastslå om spørringsresultatene er endret.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.HasChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: The OnChange event does not necessarily imply a change in the data.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen OnChange ikke nødvendigvis en endring i dataene.

trans-unit.source: Other circumstances, such as time-out expired and failure to set the notification request, also generate OnChange.
trans-unit.target: Andre forhold, for eksempel Tidsavbrudd utløpt og kan ikke angi Varslingsforespørselen også generere OnChange.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Starts the listener for receiving dependency change notifications from the instance of SQL Server specified by the connection string.
trans-unit.target: Starter lytteren for å motta varslinger avhengighet fra forekomsten av SQL Server som er angitt i tilkoblingsstrengen.

trans-unit.source: This method starts the listener for the <xref:System.AppDomain> for receiving dependency notifications from the instance of [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] specified by the `connectionString` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden starter lytter for det <xref:System.AppDomain>for motta avhengighet varslinger fra forekomsten av [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] angitt av den `connectionString` parameteren.</xref:System.AppDomain>

trans-unit.source: This method may be called more than once with different connection strings for multiple servers.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kan kalles mer enn én gang med andre tilkoblingsstrenger for flere servere.

trans-unit.source: For additional remarks, see <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start%2A>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start%2A> for flere merknader

trans-unit.source: The connection string for the instance of [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] from which to obtain change notifications.
trans-unit.target: Tilkoblingsstrengen for forekomsten av [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] som du kan hente endringsforespørsler.

trans-unit.source: **true** if the listener initialized successfully; **false** if a compatible listener already exists.
trans-unit.target: **TRUE** Hvis lytteobjektet initialisert; **false** Hvis en kompatibel lytter allerede finnes.

trans-unit.source: The connectionString parameter is NULL.
trans-unit.target: Den connectionString parameteren er NULL.

trans-unit.source: The connectionString parameter is the same as a previous call to this method, but the parameters are different.
trans-unit.target: Den connectionString parameteren er identisk med en tidligere kall til denne metoden, men parameterne er forskjellig.

trans-unit.source: The method was called from within the CLR.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ble kalt fra i CLR.

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlClientPermission"></xref> code access security (CAS) permission.
trans-unit.target: Oppkalleren har ikke den nødvendige <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlClientPermission"> </xref> code tilgangstillatelse for sikkerhet (CA).

trans-unit.source: A subsequent call to the method has been made with an equivalent connectionString parameter with a different user, or a user that does not default to the same schema.
trans-unit.target: Et etterfølgende kall til metoden har blitt opprettet med en tilsvarende connectionString parameter med en annen bruker eller en bruker som ikke er standard i samme skjemaet.

trans-unit.source: Also, any underlying **SqlClient** exceptions.
trans-unit.target: Også eventuelle underliggende **SqlClient** unntak.

trans-unit.source: Starts the listener for receiving dependency change notifications from the instance of SQL Server specified by the connection string using the specified SQL Server Service Broker queue.
trans-unit.target: Starter lytteren for å motta varslinger avhengighet fra forekomsten av SQL Server som er angitt i tilkoblingsstrengen ved hjelp av den angitte SQL Server Service Broker-køen.

trans-unit.source: This method starts the listener for the <xref:System.AppDomain> for receiving dependency notifications from the instance of SQL Server specified by the `connectionString` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden starter av lytteren for den <xref:System.AppDomain>for motta avhengighet varslinger fra forekomsten av SQL Server som er angitt av den `connectionString` parameteren.</xref:System.AppDomain>

trans-unit.source: This method may be called more than once with different connection strings for multiple servers.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kan kalles mer enn én gang med andre tilkoblingsstrenger for flere servere.

trans-unit.source: If no queue name is specified, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> creates a temporary queue and service in the server that is used for the entire process, even if the process involves more than one <xref:System.AppDomain>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen kønavnet er angitt, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>oppretter en midlertidig kø og tjenesten på serveren som brukes for hele prosessen, selv om prosessen inneholder mer enn ett <xref:System.AppDomain>.</xref:System.AppDomain> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>

trans-unit.source: The queue and service are automatically removed upon application shutdown.
trans-unit.target: Køen og tjenesten, fjernes automatisk når programmet avsluttes.

trans-unit.source: For additional remarks, see <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start%2A>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start%2A> for flere merknader

trans-unit.source: The connection string for the instance of SQL Server from which to obtain change notifications.
trans-unit.target: Tilkoblingsstrengen for forekomsten av SQL Server som du kan hente endringsforespørsler.

trans-unit.source: An existing SQL Server Service Broker queue to be used.
trans-unit.target: SQL Server Service Broker med en eksisterende kø for som skal brukes.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the default queue is used.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, standardkøen brukes.

trans-unit.source: **true** if the listener initialized successfully; **false** if a compatible listener already exists.
trans-unit.target: **TRUE** Hvis lytteobjektet initialisert; **false** Hvis en kompatibel lytter allerede finnes.

trans-unit.source: The connectionString parameter is NULL.
trans-unit.target: Den connectionString parameteren er NULL.

trans-unit.source: The connectionString parameter is the same as a previous call to this method, but the parameters are different.
trans-unit.target: Den connectionString parameteren er identisk med en tidligere kall til denne metoden, men parameterne er forskjellig.

trans-unit.source: The method was called from within the CLR.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ble kalt fra i CLR.

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlClientPermission"></xref> code access security (CAS) permission.
trans-unit.target: Oppkalleren har ikke den nødvendige <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlClientPermission"> </xref> code tilgangstillatelse for sikkerhet (CA).

trans-unit.source: A subsequent call to the method has been made with an equivalent connectionString parameter but a different user, or a user that does not default to the same schema.
trans-unit.target: Et etterfølgende kall til metoden har blitt opprettet med en tilsvarende connectionString parameteren, men en annen bruker eller en bruker som ikke er standard i samme skjemaet.

trans-unit.source: Also, any underlying **SqlClient** exceptions.
trans-unit.target: Også eventuelle underliggende **SqlClient** unntak.

trans-unit.source: Stops a listener for a connection specified in a previous <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start*> call.
trans-unit.target: Stopper en lytter for en tilkobling som er angitt i <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start*>kall.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Stop%2A> method must be called for each <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start%2A> call.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Stop%2A>metoden må kalles for hver <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start%2A>kall.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Stop%2A>

trans-unit.source: A given listener only shuts down fully when it receives the same number of <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Stop%2A> requests as <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start%2A> requests.
trans-unit.target: En gitt lytter bare avsluttes fullstendig når den mottar samme antall <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Stop%2A>forespørsler som <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start%2A>forespørsler.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Stop%2A>

trans-unit.source: Connection string for the instance of SQL Server that was used in a previous <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start*> call.
trans-unit.target: Tilkoblingsstrengen for forekomsten av SQL Server som er brukt i en tidligere <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start*>kall.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start*>

trans-unit.source: **true** if the listener was completely stopped; **false** if the <xref href="System.AppDomain"></xref> was unbound from the listener, but there are is at least one other <xref href="System.AppDomain"></xref> using the same listener.
trans-unit.target: **TRUE** Hvis lytteobjektet fullstendig stoppet. **false** hvis den <xref href="System.AppDomain"> </xref> ble opphevet lytteren, men det finnes er minst én annen <xref href="System.AppDomain"> </xref> bruker samme lytteren.

trans-unit.source: The connectionString parameter is NULL.
trans-unit.target: Den connectionString parameteren er NULL.

trans-unit.source: The method was called from within SQLCLR.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ble kalt fra i SQLCLR.

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlClientPermission"></xref> code access security (CAS) permission.
trans-unit.target: Oppkalleren har ikke den nødvendige <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlClientPermission"> </xref> code tilgangstillatelse for sikkerhet (CA).

trans-unit.source: An underlying **SqlClient** exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: En underliggende **SqlClient** det oppstod et unntak.

trans-unit.source: Stops a listener for a connection specified in a previous <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start*> call.
trans-unit.target: Stopper en lytter for en tilkobling som er angitt i <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start*>kall.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Stop%2A> method must be called for each <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start%2A> call.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Stop%2A>metoden må kalles for hver <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start%2A>kall.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Stop%2A>

trans-unit.source: A given listener only shuts down fully when it receives the same number of <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Stop%2A> requests as <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start%2A> requests.
trans-unit.target: En gitt lytter bare avsluttes fullstendig når den mottar samme antall <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Stop%2A>forespørsler som <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start%2A>forespørsler.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Stop%2A>

trans-unit.source: Connection string for the instance of SQL Server that was used in a previous <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start*> call.
trans-unit.target: Tilkoblingsstrengen for forekomsten av SQL Server som er brukt i en tidligere <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start*>kall.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start*>

trans-unit.source: The SQL Server Service Broker queue that was used in a previous <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start*> call.
trans-unit.target: SQL Server Service Broker-køen som er brukt i en tidligere <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start*>kall.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.Start*>

trans-unit.source: **true** if the listener was completely stopped; **false** if the <xref href="System.AppDomain"></xref> was unbound from the listener, but there is at least one other <xref href="System.AppDomain"></xref> using the same listener.
trans-unit.target: **TRUE** Hvis lytteobjektet fullstendig stoppet. **false** hvis den <xref href="System.AppDomain"> </xref> ble opphevet lytteren, men det finnes minst én annen <xref href="System.AppDomain"> </xref> med samme lytteren.

trans-unit.source: The connectionString parameter is NULL.
trans-unit.target: Den connectionString parameteren er NULL.

trans-unit.source: The method was called from within SQLCLR.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ble kalt fra i SQLCLR.

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlClientPermission"></xref> code access security (CAS) permission.
trans-unit.target: Oppkalleren har ikke den nødvendige <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlClientPermission"> </xref> code tilgangstillatelse for sikkerhet (CA).

trans-unit.source: And underlying **SqlClient** exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: Og underliggende **SqlClient** det oppstod et unntak.
